thread.title: Freddy Blay Insists NEC Meeting Will Come On Despite Afoko Branding It As "ILLEGALITY"
thread.title_full: Freddy Blay Insists NEC Meeting Will Come On Despite Afoko Branding It As "ILLEGALITY" - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Freddy Blay Insists NEC Meeting Will Come On Despite Afoko Branding It As "ILLEGALITY"
text: Almost 14 months to election 2016 and still the opposition New Patriotic Party [ NPP ] internal wrangling is yet to be resolved amicably despite the party’s flagbearer, Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo ’s numerous calls to cease fire in the party.
